titleInfo.title: Jimmie Rodgers Memorial Day - 1953-05-26 - Eddie Hill and Jim Evans excerpts

mods.abstract: Two identical excerpts of Eddie Hill and Jim Evans talking on stage at the Jimmie Rodgers Memorial day, held in Meridian, Mississippi on May 26, 1953.
